paper_abstract: It is shown that the compressed word problem for an HNN-extension aOE (c) H,ta t pound (-1) at=I center dot(a) (aaA)> with A finite is polynomial time Turing-reducible to the compressed word problem for the base group H. An analogous result for amalgamated free products is shown as well.
paper_title: Compressed Word Problems in HNN-extensions and Amalgamated Products
